Posts.Content: Mbcbone, what medications /treatments were you on before reaching NED in complete remission? I have stage 4 breast cancer with bone Mets for the last 9 Years, Currently taking Ibrance and letrozole but tumour markers (ca 153) rising and getting more spine pain. Thanks, May
Posts.Title: Cutting edge treatments and clinical trials for Stage IV Breast Cancer info

Posts.Content: Thanks for your helpful tips Bernie 6, - how much calcium are in the calcium chews? I am taking 800 mg of calcium citrate to help strengthen bone, not sure if that’s enough. Have you had Bone scans to check for osteoporosis? Thanks
Posts.Title: Restarting zometa infusion after stopping for one year due to osteonecrosis

Posts.Content: Hopefully having a year off zometa will help relieve some pain in your mouth. Best wishes on your decision.
Posts.Title: Restarting zometa infusion after stopping for one year due to osteonecrosis

Posts.Content: Thanks for your reply Bernie6 , My oncologist only orders CT scans every six months, will be getting one with contrast in June. Am allergic to ct contrast and will need to take pre medications.
Posts.Title: Restarting zometa infusion after stopping for one year due to osteonecrosis

Posts.Content: Thank you for sharing your helpful info Susanmary. I’m glad your jaw have been fine and didn’t hv to have the zometa for the last 5 years. Unfortunately, both my dentist and oncologist is telling me to go back on the zometa . From the info and experiences you and other people in similar situation shared, I feel it’s better if I don’t resume the zometa infusions. I will be getting CT scan next week and will discuss with oncologist about not resuming the Zometa. I’m still getting some tooth pain in same area where I had the jaw necrosis .
Posts.Title: Restarting zometa infusion after stopping for one year due to osteonecrosis

Posts.Content: Thank you bubbles0012000 for sharing your helpful info about zometa staying in system for 11 years and is continuing to work to help keep bones strong from the bone Mets. Hopefully my oncologist will agree to let me stay off it for three more years since I took it for 8 years.
Posts.Title: Restarting zometa infusion after stopping for one year due to osteonecrosis

Posts.Content: Hello, does anyone have similar experience with jaw necrosis (bits of dead bone sticking out of gum) from zometa infusion for stage 4 breast cancer with bone Mets? Have been on zometa infusion for 8 years , every 16 weeks infusion before this problem started last May. My oncologist wants me to restart the zometa now that the jaw necrosis seems to be gone. But I am worried it will start again once I restart the zometa. I was off it for the last year. Are other kinds of bisphosphonates such as fosamox , pamidronate less likely to cause jaw necrosis compared to zometa? What else can be done to help strengthen bone due to damage caused by the bone Mets in spine, ribs if I don’t take the zometa infusion? I am currently taking Ibrance and letrozole for the stage 4 breast Cancer, have been on these for two years, causing low platelets and neutrophils . Thanks, MayðŸ˜Š
Posts.Title: Restarting zometa infusion after stopping for one year due to osteonecrosis
